_header: Gaude to whom Gabriel was sent
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 460.
Subjects: Virgin Mary, joys of; carols, Annunciation
_description: A song of the Five Joys — five quatrains (abab) and burden: ‘Gawde for thy ioyes five / Mary moder maydyn & wyff’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Gaude to whom Gabryell was sentFrom Nazareth to
                    Galalie…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
Ther of thow art siker & sureBut euer florisse &
                    encreseGawde for they joyes fiveMary moder maydyn &
                    wyffExplicit
OxfBal354.Facsimiles:
Early Manuscripts at Oxford University: Facsimile

         (http://image.ox.ac.uk/show?collection=balliol&manuscript=ms354).
